channel.title: gelatin on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in gelatin on Recipes

item.title: orange gelatin cake
item.description: Ingredients 2 packets of orange-flavored gelatin 2 cups boiling water 1 3/4 cup orange juice fresh fruit Directions Dissolve the gelatin in the boiling water. Add the orange juice. Pour into a 1 liter capacity thread mold and cool until firm. Remove from the pan and pour into a serving plate. In the center of the mold, place fresh fruit.
